diagram.name: Define and authorize projects
diagram.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_SysML Activity Diagram_2054335594.jpg

callbehavioraction.name: Allocate adequate funding and other resources to selected projects
callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg

callbehavioraction.name: Authorize project execution
callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg

callbehavioraction.name: Establish project scope, define project management accountabilities and authorities, and identify expected project outcomes
callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg

callbehavioraction.name: Identify interfaces and opportunities for multi-project synergies
callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg

callbehavioraction.name: Identify, assess, prioritize, and select investment opportunities consistent with the organization strategic plan
callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg

callbehavioraction.name: Obtain business area plans and organization strategic plans - use the strategic objectives to identify candidate projects to fulfill them
callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg

callbehavioraction.name: Specify the project governance process including organizational status reporting and reviews
callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg
